anathema: Betray a fellow servant of Dhalavei, harm those under Dhalavei’s protection
edict: Infiltrate righteous organizations and governments, destroy trust, perform human sacrifices
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Restricted">[Dhalavei (The Unsuspected Rot)](/Deities.aspx?ID=613)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 322

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Vudrani Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=17)

**Edicts** Infiltrate righteous organizations and governments, destroy trust, perform human sacrifices

**Anathema** Betray a fellow servant of Dhalavei, harm those under Dhalavei’s protection

**Area of Concern**
Discord, eclipses, secrets

**Pantheons**
[Shadow Cabinet](/Deities.aspx?ID=372)

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Strength or Charisma

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) or [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** must choose unholy

**Divine Skill** [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=38)

**Favored Weapon** [Temple Sword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=418)

**Domains** [Destruction](/Domains.aspx?ID=71), [Knowledge](/Domains.aspx?ID=80), [Secrecy](/Domains.aspx?ID=91), [Trickery](/Domains.aspx?ID=94)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=1524)

- **4th**
[Honeyed Words](/Spells.aspx?ID=1558)

- **6th**
[Mislead](/Spells.aspx?ID=1605)

</column>
name: Dhalavei (The Unsuspected Rot)
